title: The Worlds Most Advanced Wheelchair! - (It Climbs Stairs!?!)
description: Its been awhile since real innovation has happened in the wheelchair space. Scewo is here to change that with the worlds most advanced self balancing stair climbing wheelchair.  This high tech wheelchair has been on my radar for a few years now - its amazing to finally see it in action. Climbing stairs - going off road... see for yourself! Nice work Scewo!
